bill_title: Recognizing and honoring the accomplishment of Alexandra Hoffman in her quest to be Miss America.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Recognizing and honoring the accomplishment of Alexandra Hoffman in her quest to be Miss America. WHEREAS, Alexandra Hoffman of South Dakota State University, daughter of Charlie and Holly Hoffman of Eureka, South Dakota, has competed in the highly esteemed Miss America Competition; and WHEREAS, Alexandra has put forth exceptional effort in life in her past accomplishments of Miss Brookings, Miss South Dakota State University, and Miss South Dakota; and WHEREAS, Alexandra majors in broadcast journalism with a minor in sociology, and has shown academic prowess in this line of study by achieving the honor of the Dean's List; and WHEREAS, Alexandra has also excelled in extracurricular activities. She is a member of the South Dakota State University Swimming and Diving Team and holds five individual records as well as four relay records. She was voted Most Valuable for the 2007-2008 Season by her teammates: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-fourth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Alexandra Hoffman be recognized and congratulated for her work and dedication in her pursuit of the Miss America Crown.
